attributes.action: Any graduate visa holder earning 38900 a year will be granted visa to stay in uk
attributes.additional_details: As this new salary limit, 70 percent of companies that have sponsorship certificates dont want to hire on sponsorship because they have to pay alot more on this
attributes.background:
As the new salary limit is high government did not set 38000 on spouse visa as both partners cant earn this amount than how a graduate can earn this one thing
Secondly if a graduate visa holder earn this amount by working 75 to 80 hours a week pay taxes he would be given visa to stay

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign the following petition: 

Allow Graduate Visa to be extended
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710084
